QuestData.Title: A Scalpel of a Solution
QuestData.Description:
I believe we are gathering enough data safely from here but...
Tharu is an exceptional ecologist and prefers we take action. Still, the ecosystem is fragile, and we may damage it if we are not careful. I do however agree we don't have much time.
It might be worth indulging him. A little.
Culling the rampaging elementals ought to buy us time without impeding our research. Be sure to cull them in equal numbers--we don't want to throw things further out of balance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Rampaging Water and $1oa Rampaging Wind.
